subtitle: Ideally make this tea bread the day before, as it cuts and eats better when 24 hours' old.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease and line a 1 kg loaf tin with greaseproof paper.
Put the flours and baking powder into a bowl, adding the bran in the sieve.
Add butter and rub in until mixture has fine texture.
Mash the bananas. Add to dry ingredients with eggs. Mix together until well blended and mixture has soft consistency. Spoon into prepared tin and spread level.
Bake for 1hr - 1hr 15 min until risen and golden. Cool for 10 min before turning out onto a cooling rack.

title: Banana and date bread
